summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West McGraw Street, from 7th Avenue West to 9th Avenue West; West Wheeler Street, from 7th Avenue West to 9th Avenue West; and 8th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Wheeler Street, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden curbs, gutters and cross walks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 404 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
